entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @CurtisHouck @PressSec @kayleighmcenany @newsbusters Anyone who’s been paying attention to coronavirus news for MONTHS (not the WH Adm. obviously) knows that the viral load is MUCH more concentrated in ENCLOSED areas & WITHOUT masks (like Trump’s rally in OK). The great majority of BLM protesters wear masks & they’re OUTSIDE.
